title: Megainvo Baby Nail File Clipper Trimmer,Electric Nail File with Light,Professional Safe Quite Baby Nail Trimmer,Automatic Baby Manicure Set for Newborn,Reusable Infant Nail File with 6 Grinding Heads
features: [Safe&Easy to Use]: Megainvo baby nail file made with one-button design, easy to spin to trim baby's nail and toenail, the controlled speed modes and smooth coarse edge to avoid baby's scratch without harm baby's cuticles and soft nail beds.𝐀𝐀 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 (𝐍𝐨𝐭 𝐈𝐧𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐝𝐞𝐝)

[Works Quiet with LED Front Light]: Equipped with a whisper low noise motor that makes the electric baby nail clipper effective and quite for trimming sleeping baby's nails. The LED light illuminates the area you are working on to gently file and trim.

[Dual Speed Modes for Different Nails]: Control speed (high/low) for different types of nail and rotation (clockwise/reverse) for enhancing the polishing effect, present smoother fingernails and toenails.
[Ergonomics Comfortable Hold]: Ergonomic design baby nail trimmer with curve shape and smooth surface for cozy holding, which is more convenient and preferable for parent's using.

[10 in 1 Kit for Different Age Group]: This automatic baby manicure set comes with 6 different grinding heads, 4 cushion pads for baby(0-12months) and 6 filing tools for toddler and adult to sharpen & shorten nail and polish the nail surface.
description: Product Description Babies' nails grow at an alarming rate. You may have to trim them once or more times a week. It is very dangerous if parents do not trim their nails in time: too long nails can cause your baby to scratch his/her face or skin, or even cause bleeding, or increase the growth of dirt under the nails. Therefore, as a new mom or dad, it is important to choose a safe and appropriate baby nail clipper. Traditional baby nail clippers? It's easy to accidentally cut off your baby's cuticle and soft nail bed, which sounds so painful. Traditional handmade baby nail file? But it is so time-consuming, after all, you can not let the baby quiet. The motor of our electric baby nail file is quiet enough, and it includes a light to make nail care easier in the dark. The electric baby nail clippers is ergonomic and comfortable to hold. The one-touch speed control and 360° rotating design allows you to easily switch the speed and direction while trimming, professionally giving your baby the gentlest manicure and pedicure Megainvo Baby Nail Trimmer Electric Baby Nail File Safe Baby Nail Clippers with LED Light 10 Grinding Heads Nail Grooming Kit for Newborn Infant Toddler Toes Fingernails Care Features: Compact & lightweight Ergonomic & comfortable to use 2 speed modes 10 grinding heads for different age of babies Built-in LED light 35dB low noise Equipped with a quiet whisper motor, the noise is low to 35 db, which sounds like whispering that only louder than a falling leaf. You could trim baby toes and finger nails without waking up the sleeping baby. This front LED can light baby's nail, so it' s good to trim baby's nails anywhere and anytime and don't need to worry to wake up the sleeping baby. This front LED helps light baby's nail from every corner, greatly reduced cutting the baby nails by mistake, reassuring Mommy at ease. Orange Grinding Head with soft sand paper for 0-3 months old baby. Light Blue Grinding Head with fine sand paper for 4-11 months old baby. Yellow Grinding Head with medium sand paper for 12 months and up baby. White soft polishing head for adult removes dirt and smooth nail surface. Metal grinding head for adult sharpen and shorten nails. Cylindrical grinding head for adult polishes and processes the nail tip and cuticles. Easy to Storage Configured storage box, you can carry the electric baby nail trimmer, especially suitable for carrying when going on a trip. Also very convenient for the usual storage needs. Adjustable Setting The Electric Nail File is super easy to use with only one button. Four working modes. You can simply operate the modes by one hand. Clockwise and counterclockwise rotation, high and low speed, switch off. Compact & Ergonomic Electric baby nail file features lightweight, compact, and ergonomic design, which allow you to trim baby's nails and toes effortlessly. Easy Way to install STEP 1 Install 2xAA batteries (Please note that batteries are not included in the package) STEP 2 Choose right grinding head based on the age STEP 3 Select speed mode (please select low speed mode for first time use) STEP 4 Gently trim along the nail What's in the Box: 1x Megainvo electric nail trimmer (battery not included) 10x Grinding head 1x Storage case 1x User manual Tips: 1. Please install 2xAA batteries before use. Note that the "+" and "-" direction of the batteries, otherwise the machine will not work properly.(Battery not included) 2. Please make sure to turn off the Switch Power of the electric infant nail trimmer after use. 3. Please take out the batteries and store it in a ventilated environment when not in use for a long time. 4. Always keep the electric baby nail file out of reach of children. 5. Simply wipe the nail trimmer with a damp cloth to clean and never put the it directly in water, alcohol, acetone or gasoline directly. 6. Make sure your baby's hands and feet are dry before using the Megainvo baby nail trimmer.
